00009 +(NSMutableDictionary *)getFullCache {
00010         if (fullCallCache == nil) {
00011                 fullCallCache = [[NSMutableDictionary dictionary] retain];
00012         } 
00013         return fullCallCache;
00014 }

00016 -(id)set:(id)object forSelector:(SEL)selector {
00017         return [self set:object for:NSStringFromSelector(selector)];

00020 -(id)set:(id)object for:(id)key {
00021         NSMutableDictionary *myCallCache = [[CallCache getFullCache] objectForKey:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%i", self.hash]];
00022         if (myCallCache == nil) {
00023                 myCallCache = [NSMutableDictionary dictionary];
00024                 [[CallCache getFullCache] setObject:myCallCache forKey:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%i", self.hash]];
00025         }
00026         [myCallCache setObject:object forKey:key];
00027         return object;
00028 }

00030 -(id)getForSelector:(SEL)selector {
00031         return [self get:NSStringFromSelector(selector)];
00032 }
00033 
00034 -(id)get:(id)key {
00035         NSMutableDictionary *myCallCache = [[CallCache getFullCache] objectForKey:[NSString stringWithFormat:@"%i", self.hash]];
00036         if (myCallCache == nil) {
00037                 return nil;
00038         }
00039         return [myCallCache objectForKey:key];
00040 }

00042 +(void)clear {

00044 }
